messages.title: STOP THE FLOOD OF HOUSING DEVELOPMENTS
messages.content: I am determined to do all I can to stop the flood of speculative housing applications that are the result of deliberate government policy and local Conservative incompetence. Government Inspectors have over-ruled the Sandbach Neighbourhood Plan. A recent Supreme Court judgment allowing 150 houses in the Green Gap near Willaston exposed that government policy is a 'tilted balance' in favour of developers and suggests that even the long-awaited Cheshire East Local Plan may not be the end of the nightmare. If I'm elected I will send a strong message that no more speculative housing applications should be approved. If elected as MP for Congleton I will protect our communities from over-development and save our beautiful countryside.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make Tories halt private developers taking millions out of building on green field sites, leaving communities suffering from traffic congestion and overloaded GP services and schools.
The Alsager High School teachers said they might have to adopt a 4 day week to manage funding cuts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: AIR QUALITY IN CONGLETON, SANDBACH AND MIDDLEWICH
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nitrogen dioxide readings were high and action is needed.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: MORE DOCTORS AT THE STRUGGLING GPs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: GPs in Alsager and surrounding areas are in a constant state of crisis with 1000s being turned away.
Sam wants the current tax system to be fairer.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour spent £6,311 and came second. ONLY LABOUR CAN BEAT THE CONSERVATIVES

community.content: STOP THE HOUSING CHAOS: Make Tories halt private developers taking millions out of building on green field sites, leaving communities suffering from traffic congestion and overloaded GP services and schools.

endorsements.endorsement: If the Conservative proposals go through then Cheshire East schools will be the worst funded in the country and many staff may lose their jobs. Some schools will have to move to a 4 day week. Sam is an effective campaigner. If he had been our MP, these proposals would never have got to this stage.

images.caption: We want to hear from you
